title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 380-7.1 - Paid family leave coverage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 380-7.1 - Paid family leave coverage

State Regulations
A disability benefits policy issued to satisfy a
covered employer's statutory obligations pursuant to Article 9 of the Workers'
Compensation Law must also provide paid family leave coverage as of January 1, 2018. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
380-7.1

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 29, eff. 7/19/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
